definition: variant of 盤踞|盘踞[pan2 ju4]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

variant of 據|据[ju4]
variant of 據|据[ju4]
see 拮据[jie2 ju1]

sentences.chinese: 许多烦恼盘据在他的心头。

sentences.english: In the state of possession both figures lose their charm and their values;
sentences.chinese: 在盘据的状态，两种形象都失去他们的魅力跟价值。

sentences.english: A certain house was overrun with Mice.
sentences.chinese: 有一栋房子被老鼠所盘据。
